name: Runic Sheriffs of the Halberd
description: There are Rootmason carvings all over the heirlooms of the Runic Sheriffs of the Halberd. Why? How? They're also known for their prowess with nearly any form of arms. Now consorting and aligning themselves with the Gibbun leadership, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
